PERSONA:
mary is a 70-year-old widowed woman living in a metropolitan area on the west coast of the united states. she was born and raised in the pacific region and identifies as a white non-hispanic protestant. mary is a devout born-again evangelical christian who attends religious services once a week. 

politically, she aligns with the republican party and holds very conservative views. despite having only a high school education and an annual income of less than $30,000, mary is an engaged citizen who is absolutely certain she is registered to vote.

in her free time, mary enjoys volunteering in her community. she is tech-savvy for her age and uses the internet several times a day to stay connected. while her financial situation places her in the middle-income tier, mary leads a fulfilling life rooted in her faith, values, and civic engagement.
